column5: Wonderful location in desirable Village West with great views of the lake and hill country. We are minutes walking distance to Turkey Cove and boat ramp. Large deck in front and covered sitting area downstairs with an outside shower.  Our space accommodates four guest comfortably.   The driveway is steep and we do have two sets of stairs that lead to the house.   We do not except guest under the age of 25.   Pets are welcomed but please inquire about pet size and breed. It is a two pet limit.
